DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Acupressure may help relieve pain cancer patient undergo bone marrow aspiration biopsy . It yet know whether magnetic acupressure effective sham acupressure reduce pain cancer patient undergo bone marrow aspiration biopsy . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study magnetic acupressure see well work compare sham acupressure reduce pain cancer patient undergo bone marrow aspiration biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: Magnetic Acupressure Reducing Pain Cancer Patients Undergoing Bone Marrow Aspiration Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To compare pain rating cancer patient undergo bone marrow aspiration biopsy ( BMAB ) treat magnetic acupressure bilateral large intestine 4 ( LI 4 ) point vs sham acupressure bilateral proximal fourth interosseus space hand . Secondary - To compare duration BMAB , patient 's rating procedure , patient 's willingness receive acupressure subsequent BMABs . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord number prior bone marrow aspiration biopsy ( BMAB ) ( 0-1 v â‰¥ 2 ) type procedure ( bone marrow aspiration alone vs BMAB ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I ( acupressure ) : Patients receive acupressure bilateral large intestine 4 ( LI 4 ) point use Haci Magnetic Acupressure Suction Cups ( MASC ) BMAB . - Arm II ( sham acupressure ) : Patients receive acupressure bilateral proximal fourth interosseus space hand use size MASC arm I BMAB . Patients arm also receive analgesic anxiolytic medication determine acupressure operator physician . Patients complete questionnaire BMAB ass pain experience BMAB attitude towards procedure .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis cancer Scheduled undergo routine bone marrow aspiration without biopsy No requirement conscious sedation procedure PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics No prior acupuncture acupressure No prior participation study
